Summary: A flock of crows and seagulls about 50 or so were doing some very weird panic flying yesterday
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Novato
There was one other sighting in Novato on or around February 27th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsA flock of crows and seagulls about 50 or so were doing some very weird panic flying yesterday. Never saw crows and seagulls fly in unison in a flock before for over an hour. Near the Loma Verde weather station, which is a n antenna set up on a private residence near an elementary school.
